website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few minor concerns, these earbuds are worth checking out if you want decent sound, long charge time, and a reasonable price.
pros: Get up to 8 hours of use with a full charge
The sound is clear, and the fit is comfortable for most
Purchase includes a few necessities, such as extra ear tips and carrying case
cons: A few customers report one earbud malfunctioning, and at least one received a charging cable that didn't work

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me.. These are it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. What can I say I have a pair of Treblab J1 eyebuds and I have never been more pleased the fit of them in the ear is very comfortable the sound is great but what I love most second only to the sound is the battery life I get well over 9 hours without having to recharge another thing is I had a minor issue and needed help I was contacted by a representative name Victor and who took care of the issue and all was well I'm looking forward to upgrading soon these babies are cool for a reasonable price.. Thanks I like..
customer_reviews.author: LARRY M.

customer_reviews.title: Right speaker not working
customer_reviews.text: Had written a review that it was working great. But after 6 weeks right side ear phone doesn't work at all. Can only hear from left speakers. Am trying to figure out how to do contact seller and her replacement
customer_reviews.author: Anil Karuhatty

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones I've ever owned wired or wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome earphones! Light, fit well with medium foams, block a lot of external noise while running or on the tractor mowing grass. Sound quality is excellent good highs, mids and bass is robust/tight without being overpowering. Magnets hold the earphones together well when not using them so they can't fall off around your neck. Price was excellent, well worth it. Not a paid shill, paid full price on Amazon. Wanted to leave a review because I love these, great sound, stay well connected to my tablet or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Blade

customer_reviews.title: Item no longer works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Bluetooth Earbuds back in June 2017. They initially were great and comfortable to wear. Music sound very good. However, these Earbuds only lasted so long. By September 2017 this product stopped working. They no longer want to recharge and no longer want to connect to my devices.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: great value.  recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I received my first pair of treblabs xr100s as a gift and loved them. Unfortunately, I lost them. I got this set as a replacement. These are a step up as far as sound, volume control, fit/ comfort, and waterproofness. I have not tested the waterproofness of either of them. The sound is quite good and the noise cancelling is almost too good for my needs. The microphone is excellent for phone calls. There is one thing that I would like the Treblab people to consider for the next model. Please, do an automatic shut-off feature. These headphones are easy to accidentally leave on or turn on when I'm putting them away.
customer_reviews.author: kit2020

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I listen to audiobooks from library on my iPhone as I walk 80 mins/day. 2nd set of Motorola S10's died and decided to switch. Bought J-1 from Treblab and wore them during walks. One day my downloaded audiobooks ran out (sometimes I walk where there is no cell signal and so I download), since I was in our backyard with cell coverage, I switched to iHeart radio to listen to my favorite Smooth Jazz channel. Wow! was I ever shocked at the sound quality! Surely did not expect it on such tiny earphones, and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: flynn

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest cord failed 2nd pair the volume button failed!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you want my review. If you are who you claim you should check out your customers before you send out these generic messages designed to generate positive feedback. Your cords are too chaply made my 1st set failed. I had to buy another pair before I left on a trip. Long story short. Out of all the in ear headphones I own and the number is substantial your set has the thinnest cheapest cord and that's what failed on my 1st pair. You really don't want my feedback right now! I will update if you fix the problem. I don't think you're going to redesign these week cords.
customer_reviews.author: Muskie Man

customer_reviews.title: Great while they lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I used these with my computer and they worked great. They've been the best wireless for watching movies and tv shows because they are the closest to matching the mouths of people talking (no delay). They also stayed in my ears, were comfortable, and the battery lasted a long time before having to charge. The reason for the 3-star rating is because I had to have them replaced less than a year of owning them (the company was very good about replacing them). Now, just after the warranty expired (this is only 3 months after the first pair was replaced), one of the ears died. I really like these, but they don't last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: mbarstow

customer_reviews.title: Fits better than many competitors
customer_reviews.text: I've always had problems with using ear pod type earphones because my ear holes are a little larger than normal (I guess). I've tried several different kinds over the years and they always ended popping out of my ears. Then I tried Trelab and because they had several different size ear pod covers I was able to find one that fit perfectly. The sound quality is very good and the battery charge lasts for over a week. (I use them mostly when at the gym every day.) They stay in even though I'm moving around alot. I've recently bought another pair for my wife. She loves them too!
customer_reviews.author: DonPaco de Caguas

customer_reviews.title: Great Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in June of 2018. They have been excellent to use. Easy connect to bluetooth, rich sound, and quality that lasts. I've had no problems until recently. After 21 months of use, I'm getting a static, crackeling sound that I believe is from a short in the wire that goes to the left ear bud. I will probably purchase a new pair soon. I suspect the short is due to normal wear and tear. For the price and length of time these ear buds last, this is a great price for a great product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kand2010

customer_reviews.title: OK, but screams in your ear like a banshee when angry
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these is not exceptional, but is not terrible either, especially for talking voices. The batteries go bad pretty quick, their life getting really short after just a few uses. Any "noise cancellation" comes from the design of some of the included earbuds, which are basically just earplugs you can jam in deep. So, it's a bit of a misnomer, but at least somewhat effective. Worst feature is that when the battery is low or you click to pair, it screams the warning messages and beeps in your ear like the crash alarm on an airplane. At this price point, they really aren't bad, though. Got to pay more money for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Night

customer_reviews.title: Sub par sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really low sound quality. None of the ear bud fittings work well. The choices are either too small which allows outside noise through our slightly too large which ends up being uncomfortable. I contacted the manufacturer reacted than just returning them and that turned out to be a mistake since they simply offered me a 15% refund to "increase the value of the product for me" (their words). However the battery life and Bluetooth connectivity are decent. The low rating comes from the sound quality, comfort, and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TimDog

customer_reviews.title: I cannot KEEP these in my ears!
customer_reviews.text: I am not quite sure why but I cannot keep or even secure even the smallest of the ear buds into my ears properly. They continually fall out. I try to wiggle them into my ear canal but they just pop back out. I am at a loss as to what I can do. The smallest of the earbuds is too large for my ear canal, I guess.....I did read that there are other sizes (smaller, I presume as well as larger) and maybe someone can tell me how to get some smaller ones as I absolutely am having the hardest time trying to use and to like these earbuds. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: CBPfromTN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't had them but 2 days and I've got to say the first thing I noticed is the sound quality of these I had the LG HBS 750's before these and the J1's have much better sound. They are light, don't fall out of my ear and the battery last the whole day and then some. Overall very happy with my purchase hopefully they will last because the LG's that I had lived 5 1/2 years before the switch broke.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBear

customer_reviews.title: GREAT after sales support
customer_reviews.text: These earphones broke after a month (probably a defect) but Treblab reached out to me promptly and immediately sent me a replacement. Great customer support and one that I have not experienced from other brands that could care less about the customer's satisfaction after purchase. Before the earphones broke, they were great quality, loved the hooks, greta battery life (I got about 6-7 hours on one charge), fit well in my ear, sound quality was decent but slightly lacking in the low end (not meant for bass junkies), and the range was exceptional for budget sub $40 earphones. Will be looking forward for my replacement and will update this review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Harshan

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound and nice construction Earbuds. Top sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earbuds, practical size, nice travel case and Great Sound. The bass quality and clear sound are amazing. This is a Nice brand with top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Venezuelan_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price / value of these earbuds. They are really a great pair of earbuds. Sounds awesome. Had pairing issues a couple times changing from tablet to smartphone, or vice versa... after changing pairing, it would go 10 seconds and buzz then beep then kick in with good audio then repeated continuous cycle. After a couple weeks, it no longer gives me issues like that. Only real complaint is magnets in the buds themslf. They are not strong enough to maintain connection around neck... Phaiser magnets much better, but they have more issues with their headsets.
customer_reviews.author: F. D. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality Update: After my comment Company get in touch with me and helped so much for my issues. How to increase the charge time and other usage details. Great support for the pruduct and they take posession of their product. The device works for about 6 hours when u use them at full volume. A lower volume levet about %60 can make them last longer. Update: After about 2 year usage, it had loose contact with right earbud, even i kept them and look after them very carefully. What a shame... Who cares the sound quality and other things after it is easily broken?
customer_reviews.author: Melih Senol

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Convenient Wear.
customer_reviews.text: My second set of headphones by TREBLAB. A great choice of headphones for people who like to workout with very little background noise. Has pretty solid bass as well. I often wear them outside the gym, because the magnets on the outside of the earbuds make it convenient to just sling around my neck. They also come with different sizes of earbuds, so be sure to find out what works best for your own comfort. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Bomb headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wowwwww....these headphones are great...still getting used to the ear fins..but man...these sound great..i would recommend them to everyone who doesn't want to pay for a 100 dollar pair of headphones..like the Beats brand...you will not be dissatisfied...and the customer service are great..the representative Alexander got in touch me 1 on 1 and his professionalism and true care for his customers is outstanding... I will definitely purchase another pair of this brand again.. So get a pair..You will not be dissatisfied.. I guarantee it...👍😎
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: I found the perfect one for my ears and sound quality and comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: Using these for a month already, at the gym and at work as a hand-free headset. They come with few different size buds, I found the perfect one for my ears and sound quality and comfort are at the top. I simply wear them everywhere everyday, battery is good enough for my needs. I am buying 5 more for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Timofey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for only a week so I can only speak with that in mind. The quality of the sound of these headphones is better than 2 other pair of bluetooth headphones I own. I also like the number of options there are to get the perfect fit for your ears. I haven't had these headphones long enough to comment on the number of hours you get on a single charge.That is my biggest complaint about all bluetooth headphones like these. I would recommend these headphones if you are looking for good sound at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick22

customer_reviews.title: They are all-around great. They have a great design and have great ...
customer_reviews.text: They are all-around great. They have a great design and have great sound. However, when I am using the volume keys on the headphones, it controls its own volume instead of the volume of my phone. This is an issue for me because when you reach max volume on the device (even though the device volume isn't maxed) it beeps REALLY loud. Is there a way to prevent this from happening? Because I would love to be able to disable this feature. Realy, though, I would rather be able to control the volume from my phone using the little remote. Also, the cord clip is useless. It doesn't clip anything because there is no grip of any sort.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear buds. Sound quality is good. Very comfortable. Good battery life. I can talk on the phone and the person I'm talking to can hear me. The only downfall is the wire. I have a pair of the Treblab XGo for work, so I don't have wires in the way. Other then at work I use the J1. If you can deal with the wire, you will not be disappointed with the Treblab J1.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these and will put them to the test today as I ride with them on my motorcycle. I also thought they would be cheap, but after some youtube reviews, i bought them. I am really satisfied and these are great quality. I am going to look at buying there over the ear headphones. TREBLAB Z2 - Premium Wireless Over Ear Headphones .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly broken :( but quick to fix
customer_reviews.text: They were working great for a few weeks and then suddenly wouldn't charge or turn on. I tried doing the factory reset, searched for trouble shooting videos online. Nothing has worked. Very disappointed. Edit: customer support got in contact with me and sent me a new pair quickly and easily. I just had to attach some photos with the original pair destroyed. Pleased with their speed and politeness.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Loving the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the Trelab J1 Bluetooth headphones for about 1 week and I love them. They come with silicon and foam earbud covers. I’ve used silicon earbud covers for years and loved them but I’ve switched to the foam ones that came with these. The foam is like the foam ear protectors used in concerts, noisy manufacturing or construction. From the first charge the battery lasted a good 7-8 hours. The controls are easy to use and I look forward to using these earbuds on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: B. Milyard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound but NOT Noise-Cancelling!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds seem well-crafted, sturdy, & they deliver a good range of sound. My disappointment came as a traveler, hoping that these BUDS would be noise cancelling. They failed to deliver. Perhaps I needed to experiment with the variety of "sponges" that Treblab includes with this set, but I felt uncomfortable messing with those while sitting between strangers in flight. I simply increased the volume to override the hum of the jet engines. I am sorry for the negativity, but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend for bass heavy listeners
customer_reviews.text: Falls out of ears when jump roping. Tried all the fits but still. Dont recommend for bass heavy listeners. After a few months of use the durability is starting to show as when going up stairs or walking quickly the headphones cut out randomly so im sure soon they will quit and wont work anymore like most earbuds out there. Update. The company responded and sent a new pair but once again these ones were terrible. Completely different issue though. Now when I try to turn it on it will start to pair and then turn off after 5 seconds. Even after being left to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good for a little bit...but then they don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these earbuds at first. They were so much easier to use then having something connected to my phone. But after a while the left ear bud started to cut out. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. But this morning and two days ago when using them the right ear bud seems to get really warm in my ear almost like a burning feeling. I am disappointed because I really need something like these when I go back and forth to work as well as for overall nice to have. But not cool if they aren’t working properly and “burning”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of TREBLAB earbuds. Unfortunately the first pair was lost on a recent flight and when I realized that I had left them on the plane I immediately went back to Amazon to purchase my replacement set. They work great, have plenty of options for customization and the sound is as good as I could expect. No, they don't sound as good as my Bose headphones but that's like comparing apples to oranges. What they do sound as good as, if not better than, is any other wired or wireless earbud I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: TB12FAN

customer_reviews.title: Left ear bud has almost no volume
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of the product is good and the carrying case is a nice addition. Unfortunately, the product arrived broken. The left ear bud has almost no volume compared to the right. For what it's worth, the right ear bud has great sound and noise cancellation. It's comfortable to wear too. I just wish both ear buds worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work OK but noise cancellation is dire
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds work well, they connect with both my phones and my tablet PC and they are pretty decent for listening to music while you work alone in an office however if you work in a noisy office or if you use them on an airplane like I did recently then their ability to block far less cancel noise is pretty dire. Overall I do think they are not bad value for money as I can't afford $250 Bose over-the-head phones and these are not bad.
customer_reviews.author: ParaPilot

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent wireless earphones
customer_reviews.text: I work in road and highway construction mostly. I sweat and move around a lot doing a lot of different things. So far so good I've used them almost everyday and not any problems other than the rubber wings that come with it to hold them more secure don't really fit that well and I've tried all the sizes it came with and the rubber that goes in your ear sometimes when really sweaty they feel like they are slipping out but other than that I can't complain. The battery life is good I've worn them around eight hours listening to iHeartRadio and taken phone calls with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 2 months!!!.....Company made it right with a new set to me with no $$ out of my pocket!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two months then just stopped during a run. Disconnected from Bluetooth and would not reconnect. Reset and connected to charger as instructed. Static in ear and nothing else. Update. Will have to give it to this company as far as customer service goes, they are excellent. I was contracted thru a company rep. and offered another set of ear buds. They arrived this week. I have not had the chance to try out yet. I do appreciate the willingness to "get it right".
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: No longer turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was very impressed with these earphones. I did not use them all thst much, probably about 10 times and now they no longer turn on even after a full 3 hours of charging. Very dissatisfied bc they were always kept in the pouch that they came in and treated them with care so no reason for them to stop working the way they did.
customer_reviews.author: Ringman2

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is okay..To be honest. If I could give 0 stars I would. You can have the headphones in a pocket or more than 1 foot from the phone. If you do the music or call cuts out anf makes horrible screeching sounds in your ear. I am extremely disappointed in the quality of the earphones
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is not very good though. It is advertised for up to 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a week and the sound and quality match the $40 price tag. The battery life is not very good though. It is advertised for up to 9 hours of use but I don't even think they lasted 3 hours on a full charge and I've charged them 3 times already. I think I'm going to return them. I need them to last more than a couple of hours especially if they are supposed to go up to 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Right ear bud stopped working on the 7th day :(
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work do you really well for the first six days I used them. They synced up really easy and consistently with my iPhone. The battery life is very good and last up to at least 10 hours of my work shift every day. The noise cancellation is also of high-quality and I am very pleased with this purchase for these first six days. On the seventh day in the morning on my way to work the right ear bud, adjacent to the controls, stopped working!! The left ear bud still works fine but the right bud is not operational anymore and I am extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: AOB707

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pair of earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I really liking these earbuds. Great sound quality and great bass. They’re great for working out and they block out all excess noise in the gym which is very nice. Overall a really like these earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds have a really nice clear and loud sound. My ears get sore if I keep them in for very long so I have to take breaks when using them. They come with various sizes of silicon as well as foam inserts which is nice because on the foam ones work for me with this earbud. They do stick out unusually far for one that is supposed to lock in to your ear, but they are still fairly secure in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great support
customer_reviews.text: I loved these earbuds and purchased a third pair (lost first one, second one was stolen at the gym). I use them regularly for work and workouts. Great sound and perfect fit- Apple earbuds don't fir my ears at all. Love the magnetic connector that keeps them secure around my neck when not in use. Third pair had a problem after eight months- one earpiece started shorting out. Within minutes they were corresponding with me and promised me a replacement headset. Thanks for your prompt and efficient support and service.
customer_reviews.author: RedArmyNick

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: I repurchased these after I lost them because I love them so much. These are the BEST headphone I've ever found. A full charge lasts days and days, it doesnt take long to charge, if they're going to die there's even a little voice that comes on warning you. I love these headphones. AND comes with a little case and extra ear buds with different sizes. I've had so many, and more expensive, that will just quit working but these never do!!! Awesome sound quality too, I listen with them instead of my laptop speakers even sometimes because I just prefer them. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but the microphone doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work well and I use them in the gym and for running. The earbuds don't fall out of my ears which is the priority especially when I exercise. One thing I don't like is the shape of the thing that is supposed to hold the earbuds in your ear better. There is no way this shape would hold anything but the earbuds stays in the ear itself. Other thing is that every time I'm calling someone with the headphones on they can never hear me the microphone is very bad. Other than that i have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These wireless earphones are perfect for doing physical activities with. Sports, exercises, running, or just doing housework, these earphones are great. The interesting part is that they come with a variety of ear pod pieces to fit well in a person's ear. My favourite aspect is the noise-cancelling ear foam pieces that actually stay in your ear and don't get loose or fall out after ten minutes or so. I don't know what the rubbery flap things are for exactly since the earphones themselves are too big to go fully in a person's ear, so I don't know what they're on the pods for. But still, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't heard of Treblab until I did a lot of searching for reviews on YouTube and I'm glad I kept looking. These earbuds are a great buy. The sound is very clear. What I like is that there is no static or hissing during moments of silence in the music. Very good treble/bass balance. Also I appreciate that the packaging is just the right size, no plastic to cut or unwrap, the cover and box is all paper/cardboard, so it's not bad for the environment. Great job, Treblab!
customer_reviews.author: From Canada

customer_reviews.title: these bluetooth earbuds really are the best deal on the market
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these bluetooth earbuds really are the best deal on the market. For its cost, you get excellent sound quality, a week's worth of battery usage, and run no risk of these earbuds falling out of your ears. There is sometimes an occasional bit of silence, perhaps due to the Bluetooth connection, but after weeks of use, these have continued to be my favorite pair to use when walking or working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Ear Buds!
customer_reviews.text: I am so fascinated by these Ear Buds! They are the best I've ever used and the customer service is impeccable! I had friendly, kind people checking on me to see how I was enjoying them. Best ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Not for the long haul
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked these earbuds. I'm an avid runner and many other types of headphones seemed to fall out of my ears. Meanwhile these stayed put. The first set i bought were directly from Treblab so I decided to get another. I wasnt so lucky with these earbuds. After about 8 months of using them, the R earbud stopped working out of no nowhere. No explanation. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.....Comfortable.......LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of earphones I've been able to wear comfortably. The sound is exceptional. They are very easy to charge, turn on and off, and pair. I've used them everyday for about a week and they haven't dropped connection once. These are great quality earphones - an exceptional value in my book.
customer_reviews.author: SusanER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the Treblab J1 headset for a long bus commute and was very happy with the quality, battery life and comfort. After ~1yr I lost sound on one earbud, Treblab customer support quickly replaced my set at no cost. Since then I have purchased an additional 4 pairs as gifts for my kids birthdays and Christmas. The earbuds are high quality and Treblab stands behind it's warrentee!! It's been a great experience from day 1 and continues to fill the sound void of a 5 hr daily commute - I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Dell customer

customer_reviews.title: Good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. The sound is crystal clear and when im on my motorcycle I can answer phone calls and listen to music without any noise from traffic or the road. I would give them 5 stars but i think id have to pay alot more just to get a bit cleaner sound. You cant beat them for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser Cat

customer_reviews.title: Returned them...not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Build quality seemed above average. Sound quality wasn't bad but wasn't impressive either. Came with a good amount accessories and a nice carrying case. I ended up returning them because they wouldn't stay in my ears and were not comfortable. The Bluetooth connection was spotty and came in and out. I guess these just weren't a good fit for my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Joe The Electrician

customer_reviews.title: Favorite earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the air buds I have tried, these are my favorite. Good sound, they’re comfortable when you’re wearing them and the battery last quite a bit of time. They are also easy to pair with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: SandryJ

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat these under $100
customer_reviews.text: No complaints on these at this price point. So many different ear buds, ear retainers, etc. Sounds is good, not great, but for this price??? you cannot complain. I own overly prices bluetooth beats ear buds and I would choose these every time. The magnet feature is great, the battery meter on the phone is great. I would put these at $100+ based off the other crap out there. Not for audiophiles for, but they also aren't $300.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Decent Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to pair with more than one device at a time. Sound is excellent. Some of the foam tips are a little large, and the remote control is a little bulky and heavy (but not as much as some others I've used). Battery lasts about 4 hours of continuous listening, days if turned off and waiting to be used. Charges in 2-3 hours, but you need your own charger (cord is included). I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommend this product. Great sound at a great price! Before you go name brand try out TREBLAB first, you will really like what you hear and your ears will enjoy the comfort of TREBLAB products. I love the J1's and will look to purchase other TREBLAB products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are great little buds, especially for the price. The battery capacity seems to diminish a bit in a rather short amount of charge/discharge cycles, but for $40 bucks, I guess it's the nature of the beast. They stay in your ears pretty well, even with difficult ears like mine. The sound quality and comfort-levels are pretty good as well. The rubber ends create a really good seal in your ear canal such that I can run my lawn-mower and hear music at a reasonably low volume.
customer_reviews.author: Ligia P

customer_reviews.title: So glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone7. I had no trouble pairing with my phone. I've only had the earbuds about a week but have used them multiple times with no problem. One caveat - I use them to listen to podcasts and talks on YouTube. I'm not using them to listen to music but the sound is very clear for my choice of use. Sometimes I'm walking where there is traffic and it's hard to hear. I haven't taken the time to try out different ear buds so that might change the situation. Have just been using the ones that were installed when I received them. Overall I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of these. The first set lasted around 5 years and then one of the earbuds stopped working, so I ordered a new set. I think 5 years is a good amount of time for earbuds at this price, especially when they were used alot and not always in the best conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Shop_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great headset with a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the middle class of bluetooth ear buds. Something with good quality that isn't too expensive. I already have a wired Bose ear bud set and didn't want to spend that kind of money again. The quality did not disappoint and even exceeded my expectations. It does a great job at the noise cancellation but with this comes with a little discomfort from time to time because it feels like my ear canals are being plunged. This is only my experience though, everyone's ears are different. This does not deter me from highly recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not a multiple device connection at same time (wrong description)
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this product, it says "Yes. These earbuds can be paired using Bluetooth 4.1 to any Bluetooth-enabled device, including TVs iOS and Android devices. They can even be paired with more than one device at a time." but I connect with my phone, but unable to connect with laptop (windows 10). unless I remove (not unpair) from phone then it detects on windows 10. Seems like this product is not multidevice paired with more than one device at a time. That's the only reason I bought this headset...if this not the case, I will return this product and seller needs to change description about multiple device connection...
customer_reviews.author: arif usman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great...but not so chew resistant.
customer_reviews.text: They were awesome headphones great bass response nice and Loud the only problem I had was that kind of hurt my ears when they were in but maybe I should have use a smaller ear cushion.. was only able to use them for about a week until my dog felt I should have the cordless ones ....unfortunately..smh
customer_reviews.author: Fixit Forya

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it and pass the test
customer_reviews.text: Sound range, clarity, and quality is great. I listen to Kraftwerk which is clear and crisp electronica and is a great test for speakers and headphones. These earbuds pass the test. The full the noice but are not cancelling. The microphone is very sensitive, and people I speak with hear the background conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Slim and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality Bluetooth Earpiece at a budget price. Please try this product before you buy a $200 or $400 earphone. They also provide you with 6 pairs of earpieces. 3 different sizes of silicone and foam. So far, I've been able to use this unit for 10 hrs before recharging the battery. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Ross338

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Looks used. Battery dead on arrival. When you change the volume it beeps so loudly i feel like it’s damaging my ears. It can be on a low level and it still beeps so loud. The company contacted me. I applaud them for following up on the review. They do work well and the sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Three months later and they’re useless!!
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** After my review I was contacted by email by the tech team at TreLab. Igor was very helpful in giving me troubleshooting techniques and when they didn’t work he issued me a replacement. 👍🏾👍🏾 Very Happy Now. I bought these to use at work and the gym. The sound is good, I liked what little noise cancelation they provided (w/foam earbuds) but as other reviews stated, the foam earbuds just crumbled apart, then the week or so later the Bluetooth stopped pairing. It would pair for a minute or two then drop. Every time I’d press the Play/On button it would start over from beginning. I’ve had these for 3 months!.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life, but outstanding customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, but the battery lasts only about 2 hours while playing music. Edit: I was pleasantly surprised when Treblab contacted me after they read my original review. They offered me a new pair of earbuds and promptly sent it out. I've already received them, but have not yet had a chance to test them. I'll post more after the test. However, I must say that it is very refreshing to deal with a company that cares about the customer this much. It's been a pleasure dealing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Z Baber

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound. Short Life. Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones. The sound was great and they didn’t slip while exercising. Like I said, I loved these. For about a month. Then they wouldn’t hold a charge. The same thing happened with another set of Treblabs only not so quickly. Sad to say I’ve moved on to another brand. Appended July 17: After posting my review Productech reached out to me. They had me try a few things and when they didn’t work they sent me a new set. So far so good. I really hope this pair will last as I love the sound and fit I get from the J1’s. I really appreciate the customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good, people can hear me great on a call... the whole earbuds is kind of heavy. Reason I returned it is because if you have one ear peice in for a call, the other ear peice is too heavy and pulls the whole thing down. (Unlike beats by dre version)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Really good thing. Light, comfortable, nice looking, good sound. I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maryna

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great
customer_reviews.text: Had a set of J1’s for over a year that i used for gym and phone use. Battery life was great. Never had them go dead, would just plug them up for 10 minutes or so from time to time. Lost them while working in the woods (had them around my neck but not attatched) so i just ordered another set
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones...
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best headphones ive ever owned. Ive gone through a lot of headphones and a few bluetooth ones....these are by far the best. Great bass and dynamic sound qualities and the extras they give to customize the fit are really nice. If I ever ruin these for some reason I will buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Erik Soderblom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earbuds for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Over the past nine months I have used these quite a bit, while washing dishes for eight hours straight in my part-time job, or working out and on the treadmill. The sound quality was excellent and the battery lasted quite a while. They also worked great for phone conversations. However, after nine months, of travel and sweat, the right side has developed a short, and cuts out quite a bit. I just re-ordered another pair, because I figure for the price, and nine months of use, I probably got my moneys worth. I heard they have a one-year guarantee, but not really going to sweat it, these things are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and worst battery life. Looses connection very often. Please look for any other headphones. Updated: Great customer service. Prompt response. I would recommend to use this product. TREBLAB did address all the concerns I have. Sound quality is great. Regarding battery life. We will use it and update my review later.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a couple of months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these because I love the design and sound quality wasn't too bad. I used these daily for my work but after 6 months my left side earbud just failed on me. It started to go in and out (the sound when I move) and now it just doesn't work. So unfortunately I can not recommend these for more than a couple of months of use. Also really wished they used an usb type-c port because it's 2018 and most of the phones have type-c charger ports but also I don't have to carry an extra wire around just incase.
customer_reviews.author: VegaPunk

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Earphones for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of the J1 earphones. Comfy fit, decently stylish, great sound, and very portable (I like wearing them like a necklace) Great for working out or on the go. The battery life is a little iffy, as a full charge doesn't seem to consistently work. The noise cancellation isn't perfect, but it works when the volume is at high levels. Highly recommend these to anyone who wants quality on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have purchased other items as well from treblab. Excellent quality. For me better than all similar commercial products.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Medina

customer_reviews.title: Instant Re-connect!
customer_reviews.text: Besides great sound, what I love most is that when I turn them on, they instantly re-connect to my computer. I use them mainly in the evening while others nearby are watching TV. Then I charge them in the morning, and they are ready to go again.
customer_reviews.author: LJT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used these ear buds during work, and they were great
customer_reviews.author: Davis Privette

customer_reviews.title: My New Biker Buds
customer_reviews.text: Just got these the other day an I’ve tried them on a short ride an they work perfect I’m hoping I can connect 2 of these To my phone so the wifey can listen to my music to
customer_reviews.author: Oldude

customer_reviews.title: Supurb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I own a lawn care business and use these while mowing. Great sound quality even with commercial mower running. I have never had a problem with sweat affecting the performance even in the peak of summer. Every bit as good as Bose and at a more reasonable cost. You will not be disappointed. This is my second pair as I lost the first one. No hesitation in ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Used them 4-9 hours everday for 16 months.... great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I order mine in April 2018 and the just broke today (16months later).... started with the right ear going silent yesterday and today it just keeps shutting off even when fully charged. Still a great buy at $40...... I used them at work 5 days a week, anywhere between 4-9 hours a day. So all together I think they did a great job... gonna upgrade to another model! Definitely a great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Micah + Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected .... excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I did a thorough research to buy me a new heaphones for working out especially. I read about this product i read the reviews and everything and decided to go for it but when i recieved it was something different, i saw in the trailer and one of the pictures that this is wireless and it wasnt, noise cancellation and i can here anything even when i have the volume up, it said it was great for workout and it sure isnt , the wire is too long it keeps annoying you while running and the ear plugs keep falling off you really sweat. Excellent customer service though
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Abdelhamid

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update: Treblab contacted me after my initial review and not only replaced the defective product free of charge but also refunded a portion of the purchase price. I thought this was outstanding customer service and I was very pleased with their willingness to stand behind their product. Product was initially good but after just five months, the right side started to cut out so buyer beware. The four year warranty is probably a must if you decide to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rgsreddevil

customer_reviews.title: THEY DON'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED THESE AND THEY LAST HOURS BUT I HAVE ORDERED 4 OF THEM IN LESS THAN 8 MONTHS. THEY DON'T LAST. ONE PAIR JUST QUIT AND I NEED MUSIC TO WORK OUT SO I ORDERED TWO MORE. NOW ONE DOESN'T WORK WITH THE LOWER VOLUME BUTTON AND THE OTHER ONE THAT ACTUALLY WORKS JUST QUIT ON ME. THE FOURTH MY WIFE HAS, NOT SURE HOW MUCH SHE USES IT.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I was a little leery about great sound coming from small ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I gotta admit, I was a little leery about great sound coming from small ear buds. I'm glad I was wrong. With a few easy fixes on the equalizer on my phone I got great sound and now use them ALL THE TIME. Great quality, and like someone else said, you will LOVE the magnetized ear pieces. Battery length is great, charging time is short, quality is wonderful. Might just buy another pair for backup. And can you beat the price? I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: stefan schetselaar

customer_reviews.title: Great for mowing!
customer_reviews.text: I mow for a municipality in the summer and these became my goto headphones. Great sound quality and noise cancelling. It came with some foam plugs that were super comfortable but fell apart fairly quick. But the others that came with are holding up great though. After sitting over the winter the battery is only lasting about 2 hours now where before was 8+ but I got more than my money's worth out of them. Atleast 1000 hours used.
customer_reviews.author: Daron

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these just for work because of the stated battery life of 8 hours of playtime. I have been EXTREMELY IMPRESSED that these earbuds cancel out as much noise as they do. I work in a very loud factory and it’s very hot in the summer. These J1 earbuds have handled the sweat and noise EXTREMELY WELL!!! I have used these for 12 hours before recharging. I have only had these for a couple weeks so I am hopeful they will last. All in all I give these J1 earbuds a 11 out of 10 rating. AWESOME PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Kellar

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, comfort, and battery. But don't expect to have them last for years.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great up until a week ago when the left ear bud stopped working entirely. Lasted nearly a year before doing so and I used them almost daily when I was at school or working out. Only reason why I'm giving a 4 is because they didn't even last a year, but up until then they were perfect for sound quality, battery life, and comfort. Also, I did drop them a few times and went through the washing machine (on accident of course) twice. But somehow the ear buds lasted for a while after that. So it might have been my fault as well, but don't expect to get more than a year's use with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there is a much better option for this price range. The Skullcandy SB2 wireless
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 months. Right ear bud cuts in and out. Going back to skull candy sb2 wireless. Sb2 are Superior in every aspect except battery life. each sb2 set lasted me at least a year with everyday all day use. Sad that the return window has disappeared i wanted to return and give them a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ear buds and company...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I received a deffected set of ear buds but once TREBLAB heard what happened they did everything in there power to make things right. Once I received my new pair I couldn't believe how great they sound for the price I paid. I truly love these ear buds and will recommend them to all my friends and family. Not to mention the customer service is extraordinary especially these days when most companies only care about their bottom line. Thanks TREBLAB...
customer_reviews.author: FujiX100s

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth the money for very good sound
customer_reviews.text: So far, my experience with this item has been great. There are many options for wireless earbuds out there, and I didnt know anything about Treblab before purchasing a pair, but I was very pleased! I dont know how they compare on the noise-cancelling feature, but the price for being wireless and the sound you get was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Milbrath

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comphy, pairs well and pause works nice, so does the volume up on the buds
customer_reviews.text: love these, would have given 5 stars except they don't last as long as they say they do. comfy in ears, love the mag clip so they don't fall off. stay in ear while working hard, pairs nice with 2 different phones on bluetooth. Really, I would buy again if I loose them.
customer_reviews.author: SP BisbeeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good .. doesn’t stay in ear
customer_reviews.text: I have had several different styles of Bluetooth earbuds and in as much as I’m pleased with the sound, I find the design of the gizmo that is supposed to keep it securely in the ear is less than effective. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Can't maintain bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Had the product for two days and on the first day, the audio was patchy (seemed like it kept loosing bluetooth connectivity). Gave it another chance on day two thinking it was probably a fluke and the same poor bluetooth connectivity returned. Never had this issue with the Beats wireless earbuds, so clearly just an inferior product. You get what you pay for. The cord certainly feels fairly cheap as well. Overall, the earbuds have a good look and for ~$40, I thought they were a steal, but you can't sell a product that can't maintain bluetooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Ry guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This earbuds are awesome. Sound is high quality, bass great. Very light barely notice that they are around the neck. The earbuds are very comfortable in ear. I’ve had every type of earphones/earbuds and these are just great.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for work. I work in construction and these have been great with noise. The different ear adaptation where a bit tricky to figure out but once I found the right ones they fit like a glove. The battery life is awesome. I charge it up on my drive into work and it last me the hole day 7HRS!!! I listen to music and get calls and the other person says my voice is clear. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Geddes

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is 1 week after receiving my product Pro: Good sound quality (excellent highs and lows) Good price Excellent accessories selection Great battery life With magnetic lock easy to not lose Gets very loud Headphones almost never fall out of ears even with strenuous exercise Con: Magnet on headphone isn't amazingly strong so general movement can unhinge Cord is a little long (can be fixed with the shortener inside the case but only to a certain extent) Buttons on control hub are far apart (in contrast are easy to identify and never press 2 at a time) I will recommend to anyone looking for good sound quality at an impressive price
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible longevity
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed In these earbuds. They just stopped working for no apparent reason. First the left ear went out then the until won’t turn on. It won’t last don’t buy it. I threw them in the garbage today and bought Tozo T10.
customer_reviews.author: Bighal

product_meta.title: TREBLAB J1 - Elite Wireless Running Earphones - Hyper-HD aptX Stereo Sound Magnetiс Earbuds. IPX6 Waterproof, Microphone, Noise Cancelling Best Bluetooth Sport Headphones. Wireless Headphones for Gym
feature_bullets: INCREDIBLE APTX SOUND QUALITY - J1 wireless running earphones provide awesome stereo-quality HD sound. You’ll hear clear treble and punchy bass, just as if you were listening to a CD. They also come with cVc 6.0 noise cancelling technology to block out external noise, thus making them one of the best rated wireless earbuds (great sounds quality and great ergonomics for a great price).

MAKE YOUR SPORT WORKOUTS FUN AND EASY - TREBLAB J1 are designed to be the best gym earbuds. They are IPX6 sweatproof and water resistant (wireless waterproof headphones), perfect for outdoor activities (often bought as jogging earbuds as well!). You also get secure xDrop anti-drop ear fins for a custom fit, so J1 bluetooth sport headphones will stay in your ears even through the hardest of workouts. Besides, they are magnetic earbuds.

AMAZING BATTERY LIFE - These earbuds come with an extra-long battery life, so you do not need to worry about them running out of power when you’re listening to your favorite track. You will get 8 HOURS of play from a 2 hours charge for perfect working out. You can summon Google Assistant or Siri on the move and combine work and sport effectively.

AWESOME CONNECTIVITY - TREBLAB J1 wireless headphones for gym, outdoor sports and exercise use the latest Bluetooth 5.0 to connect to any smartphone or computer. Ear buds connect fast and stay connected, with aptX technology to make sure the music won’t stop until you want it to. Use the built-in microphone to manage calls and enjoy tracks from two different devices paired with J1 at once due to multipoint connection technology.

1-YEAR WARRANTY – We will completely refund your order if you are not satisfied with the purchase. We offer 1 year warranty, top lifetime support and up to 3 FREE accessories replacements for bluetooth workout headphones within 12 months from the purchase date. For California Residents Only: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm – P65Warnings ca gov.
